summary: File manager web application with focus on UI fixes for type column icons, action button alignment, and tooltip management
architectural_notes: File manager displays files with Type column showing file type icons instead of text labels
Action buttons (download, link, move, delete) are right-aligned in the Actions column
View mode toggle buttons in toolbar do not have tooltips
Action buttons in file rows retain tooltips for accessibility
known_issues: Previous build v0.4.134 did not apply UI changes correctly - rebuild required

existing_features.title: Remove tooltips from the three view mode toggle buttons in the toolbar (XPath: /html[1]/body[1]/div[1]/div[1]/main[1]/div[1]/div[1]/div[2]/div[3]/button[1], button[2], and button[3]). Keep all other button tooltips unchanged.

projectName: Remove tooltips from three selected view mode buttons
